thig3.4:1.3: I saw a Nāga coming in and out
thig3.4:2.1: Having taken a pole with a hook, a man
thig3.4:2.3: The Nāga held out the foot,
thig3.4:2.4: and the man mounted the Nāga.
thig3.4:3.1: When I saw the untamed tamed,
thig3.4:3.3: from there I sought one-pointedness of mind,
thig3.4:3.4: surely because of that I have gone to the forest."
